content: this is the pattern for a starfish appliqué **i do have this pattern available for free on my website if you would prefer that option the link is down below but i ve made it available for people to download as well for $1 on ravelry ** there is also a video tutorial for the pattern available on my youtube channel at crochet starfish tutorial 1 i ve used 2 ply cotton and a 1mm crochet hook but you can use different sizes depending on what you re most comfortable with * any thickness crochet cotton or yarn i used scheepjes maxi sugar rush 201 electric blue * a crochet hook i used a 1mm hook * a darning needle to weave in ends * sewing thread and needle to stitch the starfish together * scissors 1 https //youtu be/vez3hl77zoa
